metadata.title: CVE-2024-26779 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:mac80211: fix race condition on enabling fast-xmit fast-xmit must only beenabled after the sta has been uploaded to the driver, otherwise it couldend up passing the not-yet-uploaded sta via drv_tx calls to the driver,leading to potential crashes because of uninitialized drv_priv data. Add amissing sta->uploaded check and re-check fast xmit after inserting a sta.
